targets.rawSQL:
-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Total Request and Volume
-- This shows the sum of ALL requests in the time period, not daily breakdown

SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as "Total Requests",
  ROUND(SUM(response_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 2) as "Total Volume (MB)",
  ROUND(SUM(response_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 2) as "Total Volume (GB)",
  ROUND(SUM(response_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / 1024.0, 3) as "Total Volume (TB)"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet"
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter valid response bytes
  AND response_bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND response_bytes > 0;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - FileType percentage
SELECT 
  file_type,
  ROUND((COUNT(*) * 100.0) / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) as percentage
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet"
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  AND response_bytes IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY file_type
ORDER BY percentage DESC

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - HTTP Status Distribution
-- Status code percentage distribution for the time range
-- Shows the percentage of requests per HTTP status code

SELECT 
  CAST(http_status AS VARCHAR) as metric,
  ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) as value
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter valid status codes
  AND http_status IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY http_status
ORDER BY value DESC;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Bandwith
-- Bandwidth query with precise time grouping (same logic as response time query)
-- Shows bandwidth in Gbps with minute-level precision for short time ranges

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  -- Calculate TRUE bandwidth in Gbps (Gigabits per second)
  -- Divide by time interval duration: 60s for minutes, 3600s for hours
  (SUM(response_bytes) * 8) / (1024 * 1024 ) / 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN 60    -- seconds in a minute
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN 60    -- seconds in a minute
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN 60  -- seconds in a minute
    ELSE 3600  -- seconds in an hour
  END as "Bandwidth Mbps"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter valid response bytes
  AND response_bytes IS NOT NULL
  AND response_bytes > 0
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Cache Hit Ratio
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  ROUND(
    (COUNT(CASE WHEN cache_status = 'HIT' THEN 1 END) + 
     COUNT(CASE WHEN cache_status = 'HIT-REFRESH' THEN 1 END)) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2
  ) as "Cache Hit Ratio %",
  ROUND(
    COUNT(CASE WHEN cache_status = 'MISS' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2
  ) as "Cache Miss Ratio %",
  ROUND(
    COUNT(CASE WHEN cache_status = 'EXPIRED' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2
  ) as "Expired Ratio %"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  AND cache_status != '-'
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Req/s
-- Requests per second query with precise time grouping
-- Shows requests per second with minute-level precision for short time ranges

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  -- Calculate requests per second
  -- Divide total requests by time interval duration: 60s for minutes, 3600s for hours
  COUNT(*) / 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN 60    -- seconds in a minute
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN 60    -- seconds in a minute
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN 60  -- seconds in a minute
    ELSE 3600  -- seconds in an hour
  END as "Requests per Second"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Total Request
-- Corrected Grafana query that will work for date range 2025-08-20 to 2025-10-08
-- The key fix is using proper partition filtering instead of date_format() functions

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Total Requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN http_status BETWEEN 200 AND 299 THEN 1 END) as "2xx Success",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN http_status BETWEEN 400 AND 499 THEN 1 END) as "4xx Client Error",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN http_status BETWEEN 500 AND 599 THEN 1 END) as "5xx Server Error",
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN http_status BETWEEN 400 AND 499 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*), 2) as "4xx Error %"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE (
  -- Use OR conditions for proper partition pruning across multiple months
  (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND month = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND day >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%d')) OR
  (year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y') AND month = date_format($__timeTo(), '%m') AND day <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%d')) OR
  -- Handle months between start and end dates
  (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND month > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month < date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')) OR
  (year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y') AND month > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month < date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')) OR
  (year > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year < date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Response Time
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  AVG(response_time) AS "Avg Response Time",
  MAX(response_time) AS "Max Response Time"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE (
  -- Use OR conditions for proper partition pruning across multiple months
  (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND month = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND day >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%d')) OR
  (year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y') AND month = date_format($__timeTo(), '%m') AND day <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%d')) OR
  -- Handle months between start and end dates
  (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND month > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month < date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')) OR
  (year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y') AND month > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month < date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')) OR
  (year > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year < date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  AND response_time IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Response Time Distribution
-- Response time distribution histogram
-- X-axis: Response time buckets (ranges)
-- Y-axis: Number of requests in each bucket

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN response_time < 100 THEN '0-100ms'
    WHEN response_time < 200 THEN '100-200ms'
    WHEN response_time < 500 THEN '200-500ms'
    WHEN response_time < 1000 THEN '500ms-1s'
    WHEN response_time < 2000 THEN '1-2s'
    WHEN response_time < 5000 THEN '2-5s'
    WHEN response_time < 10000 THEN '5-10s'
    WHEN response_time < 30000 THEN '10-30s'
    ELSE '30s+'
  END as response_time_bucket,
  COUNT(*) as request_count,
  ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) as percentage
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter valid response times
  AND response_time IS NOT NULL
  AND response_time > 0
  -- Optional: Filter out extremely high response times that might be errors
  -- AND response_time < 60000  -- Uncomment to exclude times > 60 seconds
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN response_time < 100 THEN '0-100ms'
    WHEN response_time < 200 THEN '100-200ms'
    WHEN response_time < 500 THEN '200-500ms'
    WHEN response_time < 1000 THEN '500ms-1s'
    WHEN response_time < 2000 THEN '1-2s'
    WHEN response_time < 5000 THEN '2-5s'
    WHEN response_time < 10000 THEN '5-10s'
    WHEN response_time < 30000 THEN '10-30s'
    ELSE '30s+'
  END
ORDER BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '0-100ms' THEN 1
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '100-200ms' THEN 2
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '200-500ms' THEN 3
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '500ms-1s' THEN 4
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '1-2s' THEN 5
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '2-5s' THEN 6
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '5-10s' THEN 7
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '10-30s' THEN 8
    WHEN response_time_bucket = '30s+' THEN 9
  END;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Response Time per Type
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  -- Master Playlist
  AVG(CASE WHEN (
    request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%manifest.mpd'
  ) THEN response_time / 1000.0 END) as "Master Avg Response Time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN (
    request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%manifest.mpd'
  ) THEN response_time / 1000.0 END) as "Master Max Response Time",
  
  -- Child Playlist
  AVG(CASE WHEN (
    request_url LIKE '%.m3u8' AND 
    request_url NOT LIKE '%index.m3u8' AND 
    request_url NOT LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' AND 
    request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8'
  ) THEN response_time / 1000.0 END) as "Child Avg Response Time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN (
    request_url LIKE '%.m3u8' AND 
    request_url NOT LIKE '%index.m3u8' AND 
    request_url NOT LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' AND 
    request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8'
  ) THEN response_time / 1000.0 END) as "Child Max Response Time",
  
  -- Fragments
  AVG(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%.mp4' THEN response_time / 1000.0 END) as "Fragment Avg Response Time",
  MAX(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%.mp4' THEN response_time / 1000.0 END) as "Fragment Max Response Time"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE (
  -- Use OR conditions for proper partition pruning across multiple months
  (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND month = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND day >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%d')) OR
  (year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y') AND month = date_format($__timeTo(), '%m') AND day <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%d')) OR
  -- Handle months between start and end dates
  (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND month > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month < date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')) OR
  (year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y') AND month > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%m') AND month < date_format($__timeTo(), '%m')) OR
  (year > date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year < date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  AND response_time IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Total Request per channel
-- Channel requests time series with precise time grouping
-- Shows request counts by channel over time with minute-level precision for short ranges

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  CASE 
    WHEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1) != '' 
    THEN concat('ch', lpad(regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1), 2, '0'))
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END as channel,
  COUNT(*) as "Total Requests"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter for index.m3u8 requests
  AND request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8'
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END,
  CASE 
    WHEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1) != '' 
    THEN concat('ch', lpad(regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1), 2, '0'))
    ELSE 'unknown'
  END
ORDER BY time, "Total Requests" DESC;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Unique JWT token
-- Shows unique token counts by channel over time with smart time grouping
-- Extracts tokens from URL pattern /([^/]+)/live/ and groups by channel

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  CASE 
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch01%' THEN 'ch01'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch02%' THEN 'ch02'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch03%' THEN 'ch03'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch04%' THEN 'ch04'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch05%' THEN 'ch05'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch06%' THEN 'ch06'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch07%' THEN 'ch07'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch08%' THEN 'ch08'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch09%' THEN 'ch09'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch10%' THEN 'ch10'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch11%' THEN 'ch11'
    ELSE 'others'
  END as channel,
  COUNT(DISTINCT regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1)) as "Unique Tokens"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range
  (
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter for m3u8 requests and ensure token extraction is possible
  AND (request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%')
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) != ''
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END,
  CASE 
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch01%' THEN 'ch01'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch02%' THEN 'ch02'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch03%' THEN 'ch03'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch04%' THEN 'ch04'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch05%' THEN 'ch05'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch06%' THEN 'ch06'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch07%' THEN 'ch07'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch08%' THEN 'ch08'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch09%' THEN 'ch09'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch10%' THEN 'ch10'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch11%' THEN 'ch11'
    ELSE 'others'
  END
ORDER BY time, "Unique Tokens" DESC;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Unique Short Token
-- Shows unique auth_key counts by channel over time with smart time grouping
-- Extracts auth_key from query parameters and groups by channel

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch01%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch01",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch02%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch02",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch03%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch03",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch04%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch04",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch05%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch05",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch06%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch06",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch07%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch07",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch08%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch08",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch09%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch09",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch10%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch10",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%/ch11%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ch11"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range
  (
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter for m3u8 requests with auth_key parameter
  AND (request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%')
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) IS NOT NULL 
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) != ''
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - New Sessions Over Time
-- Detailed unique tokens over 5-minute periods by file type
-- Shows distinct longtoken counts by channel and specific file type in 5-minute buckets

SELECT 
  date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s'))) as time_bucket,
  regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1) as channel,
  CASE 
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8' THEN 'index.m3u8'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN 'll-index.m3u8'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8' THEN 'index-720p.m3u8'
    ELSE 'other'
  END as file_type,
  COUNT(DISTINCT regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1)) as unique_tokens,
  COUNT(*) as total_requests
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range (same pattern as other queries)
  (
    -- If querying current year, use year partition
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If spanning years, include both years
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    -- If querying within same year, include that year
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter for specific file types
  AND (
    request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' OR 
    request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8'
  )
  -- Filter for channels with valid channel numbers
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1) != ''
  -- Ensure we have valid longtoken
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) != ''
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, '/([^/]+)/live/', 1) IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
  date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s'))),
  regexp_extract(request_url, 'ch([0-9]+)', 1),
  CASE 
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8' THEN 'index.m3u8'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8' THEN 'll-index.m3u8'
    WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8' THEN 'index-720p.m3u8'
    ELSE 'other'
  END
ORDER BY time_bucket, channel, file_type;

-- OFFLINE LOG DASHBOARD - Error Rate New Sessions
-- Shows unique auth_key counts, total requests, error requests, and error rates by stream type
-- Comprehensive analysis of index.m3u8, ll-index.m3u8, and index-720p.m3u8 streams

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END as time,
  -- Unique auth_key counts by stream type
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "index",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "ll-index",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) END) as "index-720p",
  -- Total request counts by stream type
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) as "total_index_requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) as "total_ll-index_requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END) as "total_index-720p_requests",
  -- 4xx error request counts by stream type
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status IN (400, 401, 403, 404) THEN 1 END) as "4xx_index_requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' AND http_status IN (400, 401, 403, 404) THEN 1 END) as "4xx_ll-index_requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status IN (400, 401, 403, 404) THEN 1 END) as "4xx_index-720p_requests",
  -- 5xx error request counts by stream type
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status >= 500 THEN 1 END) as "5xx_index_requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' AND http_status >= 500 THEN 1 END) as "5xx_ll-index_requests",
  COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status >= 500 THEN 1 END) as "5xx_index-720p_requests",
  -- 4xx error rates by stream type
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status IN (400, 401, 403, 404) THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END), 2) as "4xx_index_error_rate",
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' AND http_status IN (400, 401, 403, 404) THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' THEN 1 END), 2) as "4xx_ll-index_error_rate",
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status IN (400, 401, 403, 404) THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END), 2) as "4xx_index-720p_error_rate",
  -- 5xx error rates by stream type
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status >= 500 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' AND request_url NOT LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END), 2) as "5xx_index_error_rate",
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' AND http_status >= 500 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' THEN 1 END), 2) as "5xx_ll-index_error_rate",
  ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' AND http_status >= 500 THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(CASE WHEN request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%' THEN 1 END), 2) as "5xx_index-720p_error_rate"
FROM "cdn_logs_alibaba_partitioned"."cdn_logs_parquet" 
WHERE 
  -- Smart partition filtering based on time range
  (
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    (year = date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') OR year = date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y')) OR
    (year >= date_format($__timeFrom(), '%Y') AND year <= date_format($__timeTo(), '%Y'))
  )
  -- Time range filtering with timezone adjustment (-8 hours for UTC+8 to UTC)
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) >= $__timeFrom()
  AND date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')) <= $__timeTo()
  -- Filter for m3u8 requests with auth_key parameter
  AND (request_url LIKE '%index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%ll-index.m3u8%' OR request_url LIKE '%index-720p.m3u8%')
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) IS NOT NULL 
  AND regexp_extract(request_url, 'auth_key=([^&]*)', 1) != ''
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 1 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 6 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 24 THEN date_trunc('minute', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    WHEN date_diff('hour', $__timeFrom(), $__timeTo()) <= 168 THEN date_trunc('hour', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
    ELSE date_trunc('day', date_add('hour', -8, date_parse(date_time, '%d/%b/%Y:%H:%i:%s')))
  END
ORDER BY time;
